verses.verse: The <S%H5036>fool<s%> has <S%H559>said<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> "There is no <S%H430>God.<s%>" They are <S%H7843>corrupt.<s%> They have done <S%H8581>abominable<s%> <S%H5949>works.<s%> There is none who <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H2896>good.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> looked <S%H8259>down<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven<s%> on the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H120>men,<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> if <S%H3426>there<s%> were any who <S%H7919>understood,<s%> who <S%H1875>sought<s%> after <S%H430>God.<s%>
They have all gone <S%H5493>aside.<s%> They have <S%H3162>together<s%> become <S%H444>corrupt.<s%> There is none who <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H2896>good,<s%> <S%H259>no,<s%> not one.

Have all the <S%H6466>workers<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity<s%> no <S%H3045>knowledge,<s%> who eat <S%H398>up<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> as they <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread,<s%> and <S%H7121>don't<s%> call on <S%H3068>Yahweh?<s%>
There they were in <S%H6343>great<s%> <S%H6342>fear,<s%> for <S%H430>God<s%> is in the <S%H1755>generation<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous.<s%>
You <S%H954>frustrate<s%> the <S%H6098>plan<s%> of the <S%H6041>poor,<s%> because <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is his <S%H4268>refuge.<s%>

Oh <S%H5414>that<s%> the <S%H3444>salvation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> would come out of <S%H6726>Zion!<s%> When <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3068>restores<s%> the <S%H7622>fortunes<s%> of his <S%H5971>people,<s%> then <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> shall <S%H1523>rejoice,<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall be <S%H8055>glad.<s%>
